pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, September 21, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, September 21, 2017:

New York, New York

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver an address at the United Nations General Assembly.

United Nations Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Press Conference Room S-0237
United Nations Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
